description:
"Adapted by Theodore de Bry from an original by Willem Lodewycksz, this map has some inaccuracies e.g. the Malay Peninsula (‘Chersonese’) is completely bisected by the Muar River, leaving the southern tip of the peninsula as a separate island.
"
title: "Nova tabula insularum Iavae, Sumatrae, Borneonis et aliarum Malaccam usque, delineata in insula Iava, ubi ad vivum designantur vada et brevia scopulique interjacentes descripta / G.M.A.L. = Neuwe vnd eijgentliche furbildung, der inseln, Java, Sumatra, Borneo, bis gen Malaca, mit alen vmligen den kleinen inseln, corect vnd mit gansem sleis in der insel Java observiert vnd / abgerissen durch G.M.A.L."
